name: Morning Void
description: Kicking off with enigmatic beats, Morning Void merges shadowy rhythms with bursts of futuristic garage sounds, perfect for an energetic morning.

name: Third Beach
description: Third Beach blends the chill vibes of trap with deep, resonant bass, creating a hypnotic and vibrant mid-morning atmosphere.

name: Rhythm Thief
description: Rhythm Thief’s electro house set is a journey through dynamic beats and colorful soundscapes, energizing the crowd for the afternoon.

name: Synth Spectre
description: Synth Spectre crafts a unique blend of wave music, combining dark undertones with electrifying, synth-driven melodies.

name: Pisces
description: Pisces explores the depths of dark jazz, offering an intense and immersive experience with a twist of mystery.

name: The 404
description: The 404's hyperpop set intertwines deep basslines with shiny, reverberating rhythms, setting an entrancing mood for the late afternoon.

name: DJ Therapy
description: DJ Therapy's sound is characterized by its intellectual depth, seamlessly combining elements of techno, IDM, and atmospheric influences. Their live sets in London are not just musical events but explorations into the outer realms of electronic music, promising an unforgettable journey for the audience.

name: Beluga
description: Beluga brings a groundbreaking fusion to the electronic music scene with their Katajjaq Dance genre. Merging the traditional Inuit art of throat singing with contemporary dance rhythms, their performances are a celebration of cultural heritage and modern innovation. Each performance is not just a musical act but a cultural journey, inviting the audience to experience the rich tapestry of Nunavut's heritage reimagined for the modern era.

name: Glitch Mirage
description: Glitch Mirage’s witch house music is a hauntingly beautiful blend of ethereal soundscapes and choppy beats, perfect as the evening falls.

name: Pulse Hacker
description: Pulse Hacker’s hardstyle set is an adrenaline rush of high BPMs and energetic melodies, revving up the night with intensity.

name: IGN
description: IGN merges the aggressive beats of trap with dark, moody undertones, creating a captivating evening vibe.

name: Digital Phantom
description: Digital Phantom’s drumstep set is a fusion of drum and bass with dubstep, delivering a high-energy, pulsating night performance. With a tempo that often exceeds 150 BPM and a signature style featuring aggressive percussion and industrial sounds, Digital Phantom's sets are a whirlwind of rhythmic fury and raw power, designed to keep the crowd moving until the early hours of the morning.

name: User Persona
description: User Persona's Experimental Dance set is a mesmerizing journey through uncharted sonic territories. Infusing avant-garde elements with rhythm-driven beats, they create an immersive experience that pushes the boundaries of conventional dance music.

name: The Wurst
description: Cyber Vortex's industrial hardcore is an intense auditory experience, combining heavy beats with a raw, powerful energy.

name: Gótica
description: Spectral Pulse’s psybient set is a hypnotic mix of psychedelic and ambient sounds, offering a surreal experience as midnight approaches.

name: Canal Tours
description: Ethereal Void fills the night with dark psytrance, a mesmerizing and intense journey through psychedelic soundscapes.

name: Bassdrop Bob
description: Bassdrop Bob ends the night with psychedelic pop, closing out the Queue Music Festival with good vibes.
